meanings.definition: The blank pages at the beginning and end of a book.
meanings.sent1: The flyleaves in the book were perfect for jotting down notes.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading the author's notes on the flyleaves of a novel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student doodled funny faces on the flyleaves of his textbooks.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts took flight like birds from the flyleaves of her journal.
meanings.sent5: The flyleaves of the old diary held secrets waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: The leaves of a plant that are used for flying.
meanings.sent1: The magical plant's flyleaves shimmered in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: The fairy gracefully landed on the delicate flyleaves of the enchanted plant.
meanings.sent3: The tiny insects rode the flyleaves of the plant like miniature airplanes.
meanings.sent4: The flyleaves of the mystical plant carried the fairy to new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The flyleaves of the plant fluttered gently as the fairy took off into the night sky.
